intro: Batratherum rude, commonly known as the rough battherum, is a flowering plant native to certain regions of Africa. It belongs to the Acanthaceae family and is characterized by its hairy, rough-textured leaves. The plant produces small, clustered flowers that are typically pink or purple in color. It thrives in moist, well-drained soils and is often found in shaded or semi-shaded habitats. Due to its unique appearance and ornamental value, it is occasionally cultivated in gardens.
